label: 六通
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: Supernatural powers acquired by buddhas.  The six faculties are the capabilities of appearing anywhere, seeing everything, hearing everything, reading minds, remembering past existences, and being free from worldly things (p. 565 n.).
